validation.date_not_past: The date cannot be earlier than today
validation.start_not_past: Start time cannot be earlier than now
validation.end_after_start: End time must be later than start time

delete_card.title: Confirm Card Deletion
delete_card.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this payment method? This action cannot be undone.

add_card.title: Add New Payment Method
add_card.message: Enter your card details below to add a new payment method.

add_car.title: Add New Car
add_car.message: Enter the details of your car below:

delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? All your data will be lost and this action cannot be undone.

delete_car.title: Confirm Car Deletion
delete_car.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this car? This action cannot be undone.

required_auth.title: Authorization Required
required_auth.message: To access this feature, you need to be logged in. Please click 'Login' to continue. Your account information will remain secure and private.

map.location_access: Location access is required to use this feature. Please enable location permissions in your browser settings.

main.project_description: The smart platform for online parking. Find, reserve, and pay for your parking spot effortlessly.
main.download_app: Download the app for your device:

how_it_works.title: How {appName} Works
how_it_works.description: Find, reserve, and pay for parking spots easily. {appName} makes parking simple, fast, and secure.

steps.title: Find Parking
steps.description: Locate the nearest available parking spots quickly and easily.

steps.title: Reserve Spot
steps.description: Reserve your chosen parking space ahead of time to guarantee availability.

steps.title: Pay & Park
steps.description: Pay securely and enjoy seamless parking with no hassle.

payments.title: Ways to Book Your Parking
payments.description: Choose the option that suits you best — quick payment on-site, online booking, or a subscription for frequent drivers.

ways.title: Pay at the Cashier
ways.description: Convenient option if you prefer paying directly on-site.

ways.title: Online Booking
ways.description: Reserve your parking spot in advance with just a few clicks.

ways.title: Subscription Plans
ways.description: Ideal for regular drivers and companies who want flexibility.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.description: Transparent pricing tailored for private parking users.

contact.title: Have any questions?
contact.description: Our team is ready to help you. Reach out anytime!

contact.title: Have Questions?
contact.description: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within 2 hours.

security.title: Security
features: We follow PCI DSS standards when handling card data
All information remains secure and uncompromised
Your card information will never be mishandled or sold
